    ¬†After using these speakers for 10 days, I am sharing my feedback. The speaker is excellent for its price range; the 160W output is amazing and suitable for home parties and events. The sound is crystal clear and crisp, with every detail audible. Bluetooth pairing is very simple and fast, and the mic works perfectly. However i have not tested guitar output. The party lights are quite good, so overall, the performance is great. Boat has build a wonderful product.However, I have a few observations :1. It should allow multiple devices to connect wirelessly.2. The party lights are not synchronized with the music; they just blink.3. The mic should be wireless.
Amazing sound & good quality

It has a great battery life, connectivity is perfect and so reliable... Looks sooo classyyy... And it has an average size compared to JBL... RGB lights are jst a lit... The only drawback I have found was the mic volume is low may be we may have to connect a mixer for higher volume of mic.. Except that the product is jst Stunning with a good sound clarity..

reviewTitle: This is Proper Party Speaker & good for parties only.
reviewDescription: Initially this speaker may sound a bit flat,  In the Beginning you should never try to play on full volume,  For  10 ‚Äì 20 hours play in only upto 70% volume, to allow the speakers burin properly &  give you a good sound.I am providing you with an actual review of this speaker.Pros:-1.) Build quality & finishing is beautiful.2.) Flame style Led Lights are really bright & looks good during parties.3.) Bass & treble are well balanced.  Audio is crisp & clear at full Volumes.4.) Microphone & Echo are well balanced.  Mic build quality is only average.5.) Battery backup is good.  Bluetooth connects in seconds & no lag between speech & video.Cons:-1.)  If you are watching tv, then you have to switch off the led lights manually every time you turn on the speaker, which is really annoying & this will make the led button die after sometime.2.)  No mobile application to control the light, volume or equaliser, Remote also not provided.3.)  You can adjust Bass & treble but you cannot control Mid-range.4.)  This speaker is very poor in producing Low Frequencies Bass,  since the bass is hard & punchy.This is only a Party speaker & it is Powerful for Party Purposes.If you want to watch Tv in the room then this will surely start giving you headache in few minutes.This product needs a large open hall space if you want to enjoy its real potential.My conclusion:  At this Price & 160RMS watt, this is the only speaker available in market.Sound is enough to do parties at indoor as well as outdoor.  Only thing I am missing is a mobile application or a Remote to control things.
Spr

    ¬†‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ Birthday party ya chchota party ke liye best h. ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó song & guitar prectice ke liye best h

Let's break it down into a few sections:Packaging, product build, features.1- packagingThe speaker came in its big carboard box, inside another amazon cardboard box. So in terms of packaging, pretty good! (environmental freaks will want to know that thermacol is used inside to protect from impact)2- Product buildIts plastic... All over...Apart from the front metal mesh, everything on this product feels like cheap plastic. The top rotating volume control feels poorly built. Apart from that, everything else can be lived with.3- FeaturesThe volume does go up pretty high and I will say the woofer drivers do their part for the low end frequencies pretty well! But that currently seems to be the only positive thing I can say at the moment. The woofer-tweeter combo just doesn't work and you'll find the sound lacking heavily in any audio that has vocals. So if you're into songs with doop bass and no vocals, great! If not, look for a speaker having a midrange driver as well.Finally, the controls to change mode and audio controls aren't the best, but they're not too bad either. However the digital indicator is bit small, so it tends to display incomplete words. Battery life at the moment seems quite good! Will update this part in future. And finally, the speaker is portable, featuring wheels and a handle, but if you're a tall person, that handle is too low and will annoy you (its not adjustable).Ohh and the tweeter!... It's absolutely terrible I'm sorry but it seems to crackle at 60% volume which does not bode well...I will be doing more tests with the speaker and will update this review soon!
